classmethod getEnv()[source]
class VIV_gym.JuliaEnv(render_mode=None, env=<class 'VIV_gym.VIVEnv'>, max_episode_steps=100, statics=None, variables=None, spaces=None, verbose=False)[source]

Bases: Env

A custom Gym environment for interacting with Julia-based simulations.

This environment provides a bridge between OpenAI Gym and Julia-based simulations. It handles action scaling, observation retrieval, and rendering.

close()[source]

Clean up any resources used by the environment.

metadata: dict[str, Any] = {'render_fps': 15, 'render_modes': ['rgb_array']}
render()[source]

Render the current state of the environment.

Displays the last captured image using matplotlib.

reset(seed=None, options=None)[source]

Reset the environment to its initial state.

Parameters:

  • seed (int, optional) – Random seed for reproducibility, defaults to None

  • options (dict, optional) – Additional reset options, defaults to None

step(action)[source]

Execute one timestep in the environment.

Parameters:

action (int or float) – Action to take in the environment

Returns:

Tuple containing: - observation: Current state of the environment - reward: Reward received from the action - terminated: Whether the episode has ended - truncated: Whether the episode was truncated (max steps reached) - info: Additional information dictionary

Return type:

tuple
